CSVIndexReader - Class in src.java.invertedIndex
This implementation of IndexReader reads an Index object from the disk, with a format similar to CSV.
Example: term, documentId:DocumentFrequency,documentId:DocumentFrequency, ...

CSVIndexWriter - Class in src.java.invertedIndex
This implementation of IndexWriter writes an Index object on disk, with a format similar to CSV.

CTStemmingIndexerBuilder - Class in src.java.indexer
A builder that constructs Indexer with a ComplexTokenizer that uses an English Stemmer, the CorpusReader used here is a DirIteratorCorpusReader.
